gaia_rv_sample_size.json_critique: Criteria and output are clear, but the required coordinate conversion is only referenced rather than specified, leaving minor ambiguity for reproduction.
solar_height_from_gaia_dr2.json_critique: Task depends on performing fresh Gaia archive queries yet provides no offline dataset, and key numerical settings (exact bin width, max |z| per slice) are referenced but not explicitly stated, leading to under-specification.
sun_height_corrected.json_critique: Relies on results and data gathering from the previous task without ensuring availability of the full dataset; spline-fitting details (e.g., knot spacing) and combination procedure are left vague, risking inconsistent implementations.
gaia_breathing_upper_limit.json_critique: Provides a self-contained FITS file and clear steps, but omits concrete bin edges and the exact Cartesian transformation convention, leading to mild ambiguity though still reproducible by an expert.
paper_critique: Tasks generally map the paper’s analyses well and are written clearly, but two depend on external Gaia queries and omit certain numerical specifics, causing under-specification and limiting reliable automatic benchmarking.
paper_title: Vertical waves in the solar neighbourhood in Gaia DR2
